CustomField.formula: IF(First_Quote_Date__c = null && Contact_s_Date_of_First_Order__c= null, "Prospect", IF(First_Quote_Date__c != null && Contact_s_Date_of_First_Order__c = null, "Quoter", IF(First_Quote_Date__c != null && Contact_s_Date_of_First_Order__c != null, "Customer", null)))
CustomField.label: Contact Classification
